1. Always have the image_pixel.exe, img.png, and config.txt file in the same folder alone.
2. Always make sure the img file is in png format.
3. Set your desired parameters in the config files and make sure to only change the numbers and nothing else.
4. Run image_pixel.exe
5. A control panel will open and show you the first photo - close the first photo, second photo, third photo. 
6. Once all is closed the control panel will shut down and you will have the three new images generated.
